name: Kentucky Derby (Addison-Wesley Publishers)
overview: Ladies and gentlemen...they are off! Red Arrow is off to a good start...Blondish Boy is giving his jockey some trouble...and there's the famous Spanish Lady, on the inside track. This is first class excitement, and we've only just begun! coming round the first bend...Mickey Finn has taken over the lead, hard-pressed by Jeffrey Epstein Was Murdered who is followed closely by Speedy Gonzales.... so step up and place your bets on who will come out on top! Published in the book "Crazy Games for Your Commodore 64".
